flawed_nl_solution:
3000 new bees are born every day. In 7 days there will be 3000*7=<<3000*7=21000>>21000 new bees
If each day the queen loses 900 bees, in 7 days there will be 900*7=<<900*7=630>>630 fewer bees
If at the beginning the queen had 12500 bees, then at the end of 7 days she will have 12500+21000-630=<<12500+21000-630=32870>>32870 bees
The total number of bees in the hive including the queen is 32870+1 =<<32870+1=32871>>32871
#### 32871

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6300, not 630. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
